website_summaries.verdict: The Ryka Sky Walk 2 is created to meet the needs of women who want more from their walking shoes. It has technologies that aim to reduce shock and keeps the foot stable as it transitions from the heel to the toes. Overall, it comes highly recommended for women looking for more underfoot support in their walking shoes.
pros: Numerous owners walk in comfort wearing the Ryka Sky Walk 2
Many reviewers are satisfied with the grip provided by the outsole
A lot of buyers have commented that despite the wide width, it doesn’t look like a clown shoe
Multiple wearers appreciate the arch support in this pair of Ryka walking shoes
This trainer is tagged as breathable by more than a few individuals
Several folks enjoy the lightweight feel of this footwear
The product looks good, says plenty of shoppers
cons: Some people feel like the overlays will quickly peel off because they are just painted on the shoes
A few users wished that the laces on the Ryka Sky Walk 2 were longer because they can barely tie them

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love my ryka shoes would only buy them They fit well and look great. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Edwina Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have always found that I need one size up in Ryka shoes. Using that formula has been 100% successful for me. I really like the way this shoe fits. It is supportive and comfortable. I am an avid walker and these shoes provide what I need to get my steps in each day. They also are attractive and even make my size 11 feet look good!
customer_reviews.author: Peg Lauer

customer_reviews.title: VERY uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these shoes because of the other reviews. However by about 10 minutes into my exercise routine my feet really hurt! I then tried the shoes with another set of inserts I have and that did not help at all. I will go back to Kuru shoes.
customer_reviews.author: S E R

customer_reviews.title: Quality questionable
customer_reviews.text: Quality has decreased from previous same brand shoe Knock off maybe ? Shoe is narrow and puckers right away around seams
customer_reviews.author: Jan Wientjes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ryka shoes are very comfortable to walk in .I walk 6-8 miles a day and so far they are great. I had walked in OrthoFeet and the sole did not last long with the miles I walk.Ryka will be the walking shoe for me.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & comfort.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is well made, with the wide toe box I sought in a wide width. Good quality with decent support. I’ve returned 2 pairs of wide width New Balance recently due to declining quality & a scarcely wide enough toe box. NB needs to pay attention because competition is fierce in this market.
customer_reviews.author: Not so much

customer_reviews.title: Not Sky Walk
customer_reviews.text: The Sky Walk 2 is not a nice as the original Sky Walk. The laces are not as long, always come untied. They feel much tighter than the other version. Wish I could send them back, but I'll keep them as back up pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger J. Fitts

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I wore these shoes for work 3 days a week until they literally fell apart yesterday. Both sides of the sole broke away from the material. They are non wearable now. Too late to return them so in the trash they go. I will never buy this brand again. Situations like this should warrant a return regardless of the return expiration.
customer_reviews.author: Theressa Koontz

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find shoes that fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, but I ordered 12w because I have a wide foot, but as wearing them they don't feel that wide and feel uncomfortable around the foot itself. But hopefully the shoes will get wet and stretch.
customer_reviews.author: paws

customer_reviews.title: Ryka is the go to womens shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love the color! I it even better than the picture. Definitely won't show dirt over time. The fit is spot on. Price is perfect. Went to Footlocker to look around, almost had a heart attack at the prices! Talk about price gouging! Ryka has always been a go to shoe for comfort, fit, and style.
customer_reviews.author: orchidsblossom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit perfectly and they look/feel amazing! They're very comfortable and didn't have a "breaking in" period. The first time I put them on, they were just perfect. They are also very true to size. I wear a size 7, ordered a size 7, and the fit was exact. I will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this renewed
customer_reviews.text: The item was "renewed" and described as a pair of sneakers with scuffs on the bottom. That description was completely false. The decals on one of the shoes are not glued to the fabric of the shoe. They were cheap so I will just throw them away, but the vendors should not have lied in the description. Buyers beware.
customer_reviews.author: Ana M. Wetzl

customer_reviews.title: Is it Cheaply made?
customer_reviews.text: I received this shoe 2 days before vacation. I have wore it 9 times maybe and it is coming unglued. I know it was not the most expensive but I am so disappointed. Back to the drawing board I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Regina K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for comfort and support!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a fan on Ryka lately because the shoes are so comfortable and supportive. I’m a large gal so when I walk or exercise, I need to be able to balance myself. In the past, I’ve sprain my ankle with other brands of shoes because they weren’t as supportive. I would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: LaQuisha

customer_reviews.title: Made for qomen
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Ryka and only Ryka since I read that they are the only sneakers designed specifically for women. I have narrow feet, and they fit perfectly. Very satisfied with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: light weight.. and good structure
customer_reviews.text: love the light weight sneaker.. also holds foot nice so has great structure... I do many a mile per day and this hold up to the beating I give them.. on average ... put 10 to 12 road miles per day... good stuff....
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe for women!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Ryka shoes, they have a great arch support, narrow at the heel but wider at the ball of the feet so you toes aren’t crunched in even on long walks or just being on your feet all day. I bought my first Pair of Ryka’s 14 years ago & now I would never think of trying on any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Stitching came loose
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Ryka sneakers. They are the best brand that I have. However, these are different. After wearing them for less than a week, the stitching started to come undone. I am returning them for a refund. This is why we should have more things made in THIS country. The United States makes higher quality merchandise than China EVER will!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Bienvenu

customer_reviews.title: Know your true size
customer_reviews.text: These Ryka sneakers are BEAUTIFUL! They seem to run a little small and I had to return them for that reason only. Don’t hesitate to give them a try you just may have to go up a size. 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Fab@50

customer_reviews.title: A great pair of shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes the only thing I have to say bad about it is that the shoestrings were too short and I had to end up buying another pair of shoestrings. But overall they're great!! Plus they're purple so that's a big bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Heaven Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My second pair! Great fit and great for feet issues
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed.
customer_reviews.text: The glue on the seams isn't good. The seams on the top came apart after the first wear. I should have heeded the advice of others. There are better shoes out there. Just buy those.
customer_reviews.author: Hillery M

customer_reviews.title: Love Rykas!
customer_reviews.text: I love Ryka shoes! They fit right and are so comfortable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Burgandy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow, not Wide
customer_reviews.text: These are very narrow, not a wide at all. Smaller that sketchers regular. Will prob return
customer_reviews.author: Angela Raum

customer_reviews.title: I live in tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love Ryka tennis shoes! They are my go to shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Karen G

customer_reviews.title: Shoe was to short and narrow
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 6 1/2 M shoe ...this shoe for me ran short and narrow...and the shoe laces were way to short. The shoe looked good...unfortunately it was not a shoe I would enjoy wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Love the Color
customer_reviews.text: The fit was exactly what I’ve come to expect from Ryka however, the laces were far too short.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Dewey-Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my regular size though the fit I felt I could go up in size. Easy to return Got my new pair in two days, a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Dumais

customer_reviews.title: Best wide shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, I have 3 pairs. One has a hole and I wear those when its crappy out or when in painting. They are the best wide shoes for me, I feel I can walk forever comfortably in them!
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Good heel fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits good in heel but rubs top of toes a little
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Waldroup

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe - especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a gift for my sister (we love Ryka but haven’t bought this style) and she loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Venetia M. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: I am keeping these shoes BUT they are more grey than white in color.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Bradey

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: I’m in a foot boot for fx’s in my foot & ankle and needed these ASAP. Was glad to get a good deal on them. Was very disappointed they were to small.....Simply because I needed them so badly. (Needed my other foot raised to fit the lift of the boot...)
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Pennington

customer_reviews.title: The best golf shoe I ever purchased thus far !
customer_reviews.text: It’s so comfortable . Best golf shoe I ever had. I plan to order another.l
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great athletic shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of Ryka. Love how comfortable and supportive they are. Fit as expected. Great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Beckster

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and fit...
customer_reviews.text: This brand of shoe is best for my work. I am on my feet 12hrs.and end of day nothing hurts. Always get the special insert...
customer_reviews.author: Roberta R.

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run XXL!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality show but had to rerun. Ordered a size 5 and it was at least 2 sizes too big.
customer_reviews.author: Mom&Dad

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a Glove
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter. She loves them and said they fit like a glove. Hoping they can withstand how rough she is on her shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: That my Feet are Ok !!!!
customer_reviews.text: really nice fits really good - where i work I am on my feet - I work at walmart, no time to sit, breaks an lunch!!! was an am really Happy I got them !!!!!! Thanks for the fast service !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kelly brown

customer_reviews.title: MY NEW RYKA SHOES FIT LIKE  THEY SHOULD.
customer_reviews.text: I had another pair of Ryka shoes that I liked very much that were very old. So, I love my new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Binder

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to return these sneakers but am not having any luck. Can someone help me please?
customer_reviews.author: Christine Myers

customer_reviews.title: Shoes not right fit.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Ryka shoes before and have had no problem with them. But I ordered these, and they were tight on my feet. My sister ordered a size 8 (which is what she wears) and they fit her perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ernestine Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I always like how Ryka fits-no breaking in period Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Toni Mariani

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Best fitting sneaker that I've had for a long time. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Paula F. Arriaga

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The rubber edge on the toe has separated from the fabric in more than one place. Very annoying trying to glue it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Masi

customer_reviews.title: A bit small especially the shoe laces
customer_reviews.text: I like the way that it is lightweight. I think the size runs small as I am size 8 on regular shoes so I bought size 8.5 wide but still fits a bit small and tight. the shoelaces are short too.
customer_reviews.author: JGS

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Great shoes as expected. I always buy Rykas
customer_reviews.author: CINDY M.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are light weight and comfortable and I love that!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Routzahn

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable but give good support for my whole foot
customer_reviews.text: I love Ryka because they know what women need. I use them mainly for walking and doing Zumba and my feet never hurt!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Temple

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I like that they are lightweight and made by women for women
customer_reviews.author: Teresa DeVevo

customer_reviews.title: I’m very happy with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, still comfortable after several months of wear
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a gift for my wife and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Marlow

customer_reviews.title: Fits well very comfortable bout two pair.
customer_reviews.text: Walking on cement floor for hour and still good support.
customer_reviews.author: Frances A.

customer_reviews.title: They run narrow for a "Wide" size!  I am returning them!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the style & color of this shoe, but if you have special feet, as do I, they are too tight!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: RYKA Women's Sky Walk 2 Sneaker
product_meta.description: Make the most of every step in a walking shoe that stands out from the rest. A stylish color-blocked upper with breathable mesh and leather and flex gear overlays give her lightweight support, while a plush fit insole and durable rubber outsole with a color pop gradient detail give her a standout look and feel.
